snippet: Beginning his second term only hours before the death of his father, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo in his inaugural address promised to confront issues of economic mobility and fairness in the justice system.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo begins his second term hours before his father Mario's death promising to address deep-rooted challenges like fairness of justice system, declining economic mobility and state of public education; Cuomo's inaugural speech is haunting reminder of former Gov Mario M Cuomo's oratorical style.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and JESSE McKINLEY
byline.contributor: Rebecca Bratek contributed reporting from Buffalo.

lead_paragraph: Beginning his second term only hours before the death of his father, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo in his inaugural address promised to confront issues of economic mobility and fairness in the justice system.

headline.main: Andrew Cuomo Puts Bigger Challenges on His 2nd-Term Agenda
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Putting Big Challenges on His Agenda
